request.content:
You are a module within an automated web agent tasked with simulating a user's interaction with a web page. Your specific role is the PERCEIVE module.

You will be provided with an environment that includes:
- A URL
- Simplified HTML content of THE CURRENT VIEWPOINT OF THE PAGE
- A list of all buttons on the page
- A list of all inputs on the page
- Optionally, a CSS selector called diff_selector of the element changed in the last step

Your task is to simulate human perception of the page accurately. Read the given viewpoint of the page from top to bottom and list all observations, capturing all the information that a human user would notice.
You should think in the first person.
The list of all buttons and all inputs are for reference only. You should only produce buttons within the viewpoint (the "page" you are looking at).
Do not describe relative order between observations, for example, "first" and "second" should not be used. Just describe them in the order they appear, but dont use "first" and "second" to describe them.
Since you will be only looking at a specific part of the page, which may be empty, you should only write what you see. If it's empty, just output an empty array.

If a diff_selector is provided, it means that the page only changed in the area of the element with the given selector.
In this case, the HTML shown to you is the changed part of the page.

## Principles
* **EACH OBSERVATION SHOULD BE INDEPENDENT**. For every logical element (not necessarily a single HTML element. A form, a product card, ...) should be described in ONE paragraph of observation.
    * For example, for `product-item-info` class, you should describe the product card as a whole. Do not split it into multiple observations.
    * User should be able to understand each observation independently. For example, "An 'Add to Cart' button is present on the product card, allowing users to easily add the Cheongeun Sweet Potato Starch Powder to their shopping cart." is not acceptable since the product name and other information are not included. Combine them into one observation.
* **WRITE EVERY DETAIL**. A blind person should able to understand every detail of the web page with your support. This including listing ALL OPTIONS of radio buttons, no matter how long are they.

Examples of observations include:
1. A search box with the input name "search" and placeholder "Search".
2. A button with the name "search" and the text "Search".
3. A list of products.
4. A product with the name XXX and ASIN XXX, priced at XXX.
5. A select option menu with sorting options 'price', 'name' and 'relevance'. The current selected option is 'price'.
6. A button named 'set ascending direction', which means the current sorting direction is descending.
7. There is a product card displayed for 'Belle Of The Ball Princess Sprinkle Mix'. It features an image of the product showcasing colorful sprinkles, and the image is accessible via a URL. The rating is shown as 'Rating: 63%', and there is a link to view '12 Reviews'. The product name is fully detailed and includes keywords related to its use, such as 'Wedding Colorful Sprinkles, Cake Cupcake Cookie Sprinkles, Ice Cream Candy Sprinkles, Yellow Gold Red Royal Red Rose Icing Flowers Decorating Sprinkles'. The price of the product is listed as '$23.50'. There is also an 'Add to Cart' button available for users to purchase this item.

Output your observations as a JSON object in the following format:

```json
{
    "observations": [
        "<observation 1>",
        "<observation 2>",
        ...
    ]
}
```

{"url": "http://ec2-3-131-244-37.us-east-2.compute.amazonaws.com:7770/senight-women-s-jean-jacket-long-sleeve-classic-distressed-fray-hem-tassels-denim-trucker-jackets.html", "page": "SeNight Women's Jean Jacket Long Sleeve Classic Distressed Fray Hem Tassels Denim Trucker Jackets

SeNight Women's Jean Jacket Long Sleeve Classic Distressed Fray Hem Tassels Denim Trucker Jackets

Rating: 78 % of 100 12 Reviews
$35.99

{"url": "http://ec2-3-131-244-37.us-east-2.compute.amazonaws.com:7770/senight-women-s-jean-jacket-long-sleeve-classic-distressed-fray-hem-tassels-denim-trucker-jackets.html", "page": "
Details
Reviews 12
Customer Reviews
  1. Cute I guess
    Rating: 60%
    The media could not be loaded. I liked it a lot. Didn\u2019t like how the rhinestones kept falling off. Also was shorter than I expected. Review by Amazon CustomerAmazon Customer Posted on 4/19/23
  2. MUCH SHORTER THAN PICTURED, PAPER THIN!!
    Rating: 60%
    Don't wear this if there's ANY cool breeze. This thing is PAPER THIN! Surprised it's not see through! And it's only waist length, NOT long as shown in the photo! It's a comfortable, very light, shirt-weight jacket that you could wear on maybe 60-70\u00b0 weather. Review by isaidso Posted on 4/19/23
  3. Super cute denim jacket!!
    Rating: 80%
    Super cute accessory to jazz up any outfit. Since it\u2019s not actually denim, it\u2019s stretchy and runs a little big. I ordered a size M and it\u2019s a good fit with some extra room. The sleeves are too long for me, but I\u2019m 5\u20190 and that\u2019s to be expected. I typically wear a medium in all tops and jackets, but if I wanted a more snug fit, I\u2019d opt for a size small. Review by Mrs.Ray Posted on 4/19/23
  4. Love it.
    Rating: 100%
    Ok, love , love ,love!! My only issue is making sure to dry clean it because the beads are delicate. I bought mine a size XL which is my normal size, this item runs a tad bit small, reading previews I decided that XL would suite my needs because I dont plan on buttoning it up. I have broader torso and shoulders with curve is my waist , this is a great jacket to show it all off, with room incase I loose 10lbs lol Review by mykah Posted on 4/19/23
  5. Horribly made, ill fitted and looks nothing like the picture!
    Rating: 20%
    Disappointed!!!! This jacket is ill fitting and horribly made. The sleeves are super long and twisted, the shoulders are to large for the jacket and the stitching job is awful. Cheaply made!! I will be returning it. Review by MonikMonik Posted on 4/19/23
  6. VERY STYLISH!
    Rating: 100%
    I am a size 12/14 and so I ordered the XL, but I am returning it for a Large. I didn't realize how stretchy the material was and so it doesn't fit really snug. I want to be able to wear a slimming dress underneath. So hopefully, it fits well. Review by Diva D Posted on 4/19/23
  7. Thank you for this jacket
    Rating: 100%
    Omg I love dis jacket by far my most loved item in my closet Review by Wanda RichardsWanda Richards Posted on 4/19/23
  8. My favorite buy on here yet
    Rating: 100%
    Soooo cute! But it runs slightly large/true to size and does have some stretch to it , so if you want it to fit tight buy your normal size or a size down Review by Amazon Customer Posted on 4/19/23
  9. Fits great, smells at first
    Rating: 100%
    The jacket fits really well and I get a ton of compliments on it.It did smell really bad when I got it but went away after one wash. Review by Katie MarieKatie Marie Posted on 4/19/23
  10. Definitely NOT a jacket.
    Rating: 100%
    This "denim shirt" fit very cute. However it a not a jacket. This is a very expensive denim shirt. I love it but it should have been much cheaper bc it is NOT a jacket. Very thin. Not even the material of good Jeans but can be dressed up or down. You will be very cold if you expect it to be a jacket though. Review by kesha Posted on 4/19/23
